regen.absent_element: situation handling for aborting operations if necessary
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall have the capability to abort the automatic launch and recovery procedures when deemed necessary.

regen.absent_element: situation of aborting automatic launch and recovery if necessary
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall have the capability to abort automatic launch and recovery operations if necessary, to ensure safety or based on operator input.

regen.absent_element: handling of aborting launch and recovery operations
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall immediately abort automatic launch or recovery operations if unsafe conditions are detected or as instructed by the operator.

label: The TCS shall initiate abort the launch and recovery procedures if required.
absence: action of aborting the launch and recovery procedures
